## Table of Contents

```{r icontibble, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
faread <-  as.character(fa("book", fill = "#739670", height = "17px"))
fadc <-  as.character(fa("chalkboard", fill = "#764874", height = "17px"))
famat <-  as.character(fa("lightbulb", fill = "#eb7b59", height = "17px"))
faextra <-  as.character(fa("square-plus", fill = "#4f5bd5", height = "17px"))
fatask <- as.character(fa("bars-progress", fill = "#cf4647", height = "17px"))
fadue <- as.character(fa("folder-open", fill = "#2a6e84", height = "17px"))

tableofcontent <- tibble(
  
  type <- c("Readings", 
            "Data Camp",
            "Materials",
            "Extras",
            "Tasks",
            "To Do List"),
  
  location <- c("<a href='/readings/'>Go</a>",
                "<a href='/datacamp/'>Go</a>",
                "<a href='/materials/'>Go</a>",
                "<a href='/extras/'>Go</a>",
                "<a href='/tasks/'>Go</a>",
                "<a href='/due/'>Go</a>"),
  
  icon <- c(faread,
            fadc,
            famat,
            faextra,
            fatask,
            fadue),
  
  descr <- c("Weekly readings.",
             "R/RStudio Training modules.",
             "Interactive R lessons and other specific content",
             "Additional examples to help with understanding",
             "Weekly tasks and deliverables.",
             "Weekly submission information."
             ),
  
  .name_repair = "minimal"

  ) 
```

<center>
```{r, echo=FALSE}
tableofcontent %>%
  kbl(col.names = NULL, 
      "html", 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'lccl') %>%

              bold = TRUE)
```
